Add DialogBox.fxml and DialogBox.java to support chat bubble UI.
This encapsulates a single message with avatar and text so the
ListView can display rich dialog items for both user and bot.
[Level-10] Wire GUI to Bestbot backend and Ui overload
Integrate the existing Bestbot backend with the JavaFX UI by
a Bestbot instance into MainWindow after loading FXML so the
GUI can call backend logic without printing to the console.
Level-10: Implemented JavaFX GUI and merged to master
This tag marks the commit created by merging branch-Level-10 into
master. It includes DialogBox, MainWindow, backend integration,
Ui overload, styles, and resources for Level-10.
